content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: VISITNUM
      operator: non_empty
    - name: SVPRESP
      operator: equal_to
      value: Y
    - name: VISITNUM
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value: $TV_VISITNUM
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0033_OLD_TO_BE_DISCARDED
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: If VISITNUM is not null and VISIT is planned then VISITNUM should be
  among TV.VISITNUM
Operations:
  - domain: TV
    id: $TV_VISITNUM
    name: VISITNUM
    operator: distinct
Outcome:
  Message: For a planned visit, non missing VISITNUM value must be among those present
    in TV.VISITNUM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0033
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: For planned visits, values of VISIT, VISITNUM, and
                  VISITDY must be those defined in the Trial Visits (TV) dataset (Section
                  7.3.1, Trial Visits).
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 4.4.5
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SV

json.Description: If VISITNUM is not null and VISIT is planned then VISITNUM should be among TV.VISITNUM

Outcome.Message: For a planned visit, non missing VISITNUM value must be among those present in TV.VISITNUM

Citations.Cited_Guidance: For planned visits, values of VISIT, VISITNUM, and VISITDY must be those defined in the Trial Visits (TV) dataset (Section 7.3.1, Trial Visits).
